title: Central tyre inflation system
summary: Central tyre inflation system to regulate the pressure of all tyres on a vehicle.

description.descriptionText01: Central tyre inflation system to regulate the pressure of all tyres on a vehicle.
description.descriptionText02: Allows inflation or deflation of tyres from the cab to suit ground conditions and in an emergency maintain air pressure in a tyre if there is a slow leak until the vehicle can be moved to a safe place to fix the leak.

eligibility.eligibiltyBullet01: Must include a pneumatic control unit, operator control panel, wheel valves and pressure switch.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet02: Only systems fitted to agricultural vehicles are eligible. Systems for cars, 4x4s, vans and commercial vehicles are not eligible.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet03: Must be able to be retro fitted to any tractor.
